trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around September 10th 2001
divs: sighting details*link moved to "additional evidence" section below--sgonzalez\cms. that link above, is what i posted 10 mins after the event occurred on sept 10th 2001... i just hopped into bed... and was about to fall asleep for the night... when i heard a very loud hovering, swoosh sound on my roof.. sounded like some kind of hi-tech aircraft... sacred me.. so i tried to get up.. but i was stuck to my bed with a force field type of energy... froze my eyelids shut.. i couldnt move or speak... i panicked i felt a telepathic voice say... don't be scared.. i felt it on my forehead. the sound left.. and i was able to get up... the next day, the world trade center collapsed... and i thought it was a very odd coincidence.. i don't believe in coincidences tho.
